profile:
LWE is a full service company. We design, build new, renovate, remodel and restore plus we offer local expertise. Our skills and experience encompass all aspects of the building process including planning and management as well as construction and custom finishing.

Your vision might be a new home, an updated kitchen, the restoration of a heritage building, a dynamic retail space or a productive commercial space. LWE is a one stop builder, a company that provides all the services you’ll require to transform your vision into reality.

Among us you’ll find an in-house draftsperson, journeyman and apprentice carpenters, cabinet makers, custom metal workers, labourers, project managers, office administrators and owners. Depending on the client and project, our crew often includes trusted partners, architects, designers, and engineers, as well as plumbers, electricians, plasterers,   painters, landscapers and stone masons.

We’ll use our skills, experience and expertise to ensure:
The least amount of stress to you, with
The best possible outcome for your budget, plus a
High quality end product, one that will stand the test of time.
